backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, media feed CRUD, like toggling, and access‑controlled operations via authorization and blob‑storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions using OKLCH variables with dark/light modes and global styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: PWA entry HTML with manifest, icons, viewport settings, and root app mount.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, colors, orientation, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing static asset caching, network-first fetch handling, offline fallback, and cache versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile gating, feed display, upload/search buttons, PIN challenge, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Renders a profile setup form that saves the user's name using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/editor/MediaEdit: Provides a dialog for editing images or videos with filters, text, cropping, and trimming before outputting an edited file.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedItem.ts: Displays a feed item with auto-play video, like interactions, overlays, and speed controls when active.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedOverlay: Shows handle, caption, and optional controls in a bottom gradient overlay on feed items.
frontend/src/components/feed/Interaction: Offers like, comment, share, and download actions for a feed item, handling authentication and UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/SpeedContro: Dropdown control allowing users to change video playback speed.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadButto: Button that opens the upload dialog if the user is authenticated, otherwise prompts login.
frontend/src/components/feed/UploadDialo: Dialog for uploading images or videos with caption, capture/edit options, and progress handling.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeed.t: Scrollable feed that loads items, tracks active item via intersection observer, and supports external scroll-to-item control.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoFeedIt: Empty file placeholder for an individual feed item component.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchBut: Button that opens the search dialog.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDia: Dialog for searching feed items with debounced input, result listing, and identity check.
frontend/src/components/security/PinChal: PIN verification dialog enforcing attempts and triggering success or lockout behavior.
frontend/src/components/security/Securit: Opens the security setup dialog from a button.
Multi-step setup dialog for configuring PIN and security questions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor instances tied to identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeviceTrust.ts: Manages per-device ID and trust state using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Provides a hook that detects double-tap or double-click events and triggers a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching feed items, uploading media, and toggling likes with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecuritySetup.ts: Manages PIN and security questions in localStorage and provides verification helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles, theme variables, layout rules, and mobile/PWA-specific behaviors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/downloadMedia.ts: Downloads a media file from a URL by creating a temporary link and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/mediaEdits.ts: Applies simple image and video edits using canvas and returns edited files.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s feature set, issues, and architectural notes for a TikTok-style web app, including feed behavior, search, media tools, security flows, and known upload/feed bugs.
